defaultOpen.description:
The initial open state of the collapsible when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the open state of the collapsible.

lazyMount.description: Whether the content should be lazy mounted

onExitComplete.description: Callback fired when the animation ends

onOpenChange.description: The callback invoked when the open state changes.

open.description: The controlled open state of the collapsible.

unmountOnExit.description: Whether the content should be unmounted when collapsed
